ygData.subject: RE: Finding a Flute
ygData.msgSnippet: The closest place I know where you could buy a flute is in Rathe Mountains from the gypsies. I remember reading on this board that someone who had died would
ygData.messageBody:
The closest place I know where you could buy a flute is in Rathe Mountains
from the gypsies. I remember reading on this board that someone who had died
would just go and kill a lizardmen with their DDD/COD songs and then buy a
flute.

The other idea that John Kim mentioned a while back(and someone else more
recently), was that before you go to Cazic, load up on flutes, duel a friend
in Ogguk and have him kill you, then loot everything except the flutes, so
that you'd have a storage corpse.

---Windleaf

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Peck White [mailto:peck_white@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 14, 2000 8:02 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Finding a Flute
>
>
> From: Peck White <peck_white@...>
>
> Well, I went to Cazic Thule for the first time last
> night at 3/4 of a bubble to go to get to level 20. I
> went because one of my guildmates wanted me to go with
> him. We got ourselves bound just inside Ogguk and
> then proceeded to Cazic. To make a long story short I
> now have a whole bub to go to get to 20 and my body is
> somewhere in the maze.
>
> What I want to know is...
>
> Where can I buy a wind instrument in Feerrot or Ogguk?
>
>
> I've already died once on my first attempt at a CR due
> to the Camo that I had dropping just as a train went
> by. I trust my own song more than someone elses
> spell.
>
> Thanks in advance,
>
> Tomerrilin
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
